title.value: Joint Machine-Transporter Scheduling for Multistage Jobs with Adjustable Computation Time
title.justification: This is the title as provided in the user's information and directly reflects the content and focus of the research.
title.quote: Joint Machine-Transporter Scheduling for Multistage Jobs with Adjustable Computation Time

extractions.description: This paper presents an optimization method with adjustable computation time for scheduling problems involving machines and transporters across multiple stages. The proposed approach involves discretizing time, clustering jobs, and using integer linear programming to create schedules that minimize both time and energy consumption. The method is applied to a robotic water sampling project.

type.justification: The paper involves experimentation and simulation on a real-world problem (robotic water sampling project), providing data and results.
type.quote: This section shows simulation results on 15 randomly generated experiments with 100 jobs, 10 drones, and 10 laboratories.

name.justification: The optimization and scheduling methods used in the paper are under the broad field of Artificial Intelligence.
name.quote: This paper presents a scalable solution with adjustable computation time for the joint problem of scheduling and assigning machines and transporters for missions that must be completed in a fixed order of operations across multiple stages.

name.justification: The paper focuses on robotic systems, specifically employing a multi-robot system for scheduling and transportation tasks.
name.quote: A battery-operated multi-robot system with a maximum travel range is employed as the transporter between stages and charging them is considered as an operation.

name.justification: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Google OR-Tools for solving the optimization problem.
name.quote: Googleâ€™s OR-Tools is selected as the solver, and the candidate value is added as an integer variable to the solver that can take only 0 or 1 for each candidate schedule.
